website_summaries.verdict: A jerky you can try if you are on the Whole30 diet.
pros: This set comes with half jalapeño and half original flavors
cons: These are pricey and the texture can seem a little mushy

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting snack sticks
customer_reviews.text: I have tried four flavors and while all are good I like the bit of bite in the Cranberry Jalapeño and straight Jalapeño sticks. Not only is the flavor really good but they are not nearly as greasy as some brands, including the big national ones sold in all the convenience stores. While it has nothing to do with flavor I also enjoy the little sayings hidden inside the wrappers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: Love jerky but this stuff was the worst tasting thing I have eaten. It was like shoe leather with the flavor of old shoe. It took a full 15 minutes to get the bad taste out of my mouth. It was not like jerky meat it was a small meat meal stick dried so hard it will never go bad. Tried to give a piece to my dog and he would not eat, took one bit and spit it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R

customer_reviews.title: Just say no
customer_reviews.text: After reading rave reviews I tried these sticks. They are overpriced, under flavored, over packaged and I really did not like them. Always a personal preference, just not mine!
customer_reviews.author: A. Landry

customer_reviews.title: So Good
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this brand because it had no carbs and a good amount of protein. To be honest I wasn’t expecting much in way of flavor but boy was I wrong. They are delicious. Great flavor variety, moist and still healthy. I bought the variety pack and still working my way through the flavors. So far my favorite was the beef sea salt but I’m trying a spicy flavor today... these are a must try. Absolutely worth your order.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne

customer_reviews.title: CHOMPS has the best jerky sticks I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Was so pleased with this variety pack. I personally loved every flavor. Will definitely buy these again, and the price is perfect!! Such a great snack; tasty, filling, and quality ingredients. Definitely a brand I trust and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Jam

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t give tummy issues ... YAY
customer_reviews.text: I’m not normally a meat stick eater but I may be one now. I can’t do nitrates or other preservatives. Chomps may now have converted me. I can eat these without any tummy issues. Tried the variety and wasn’t so crazy bout the turkey but all the others, yum I thought pricey at first but I checked out other brands and they are all comparable
customer_reviews.author: NJane B-LO NY

customer_reviews.title: Variety is the spice of life
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciate the variety pack so I could sample flavors before deciding which to buy separately. The cranberry habanero is hands down my favorite of the bunch with the perfect balance of heat with the tart slight sweetness of the cranberry. The salt & pepper venison is also good and surprised me in that it didn't taste overly "gamey".
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best on-the-go snack
customer_reviews.text: We love the Chomp sticks in our house, especially the turkey Chomp. They’re great for baseball games, traveling, or just a quick snack on-the-go. My son loves them and I love that they’re healthier for him than the jerky sticks you get in a convenience store!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Chomps are great
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure if these meat sticks would be good, asked the trader Joe's ppl if anything like slim jim, they said if you like those you'll love chomps. So I got a couple. Next day I got the box full here. Really great tasting protein filled stick. Very happy with them. So perfect for on the go snack, keto dieting, or anytime.
customer_reviews.author: D. Muisener

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These meat sticks are the best I've had!!! Clean ingredients and the taste is amazing!! I bought the variety pack and while all the flavors are good, I LOVE the jalapeño beef and jalapeño turkey the best. Definitely a snack to keep in the pantry at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality snack
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. They are a bit pricey, but for the quality, they are well worth it. We follow a Keto diet and these Chomp sticks are a easy and yummy way to break a fast. The individual packaging helps for on the go. Also, this particular flavor (jalapeno) is not too spicy, but just enough kick. I need to buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: veRoni

customer_reviews.title: Not a “Variety”!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Chomps sticks before and am a fan. I introduced my husband to them and he liked them as well. He was curious about other flavor so I purchased this “variety trial pack” that is supposed to have 8 flavors. My box only had two flavors...one of which my husband had already tried. The box clearly says 8 flavors. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VmV

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive flavors pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn’t give these 5 stars is because I ordered the variety pack which shows several different flavors. Only Italian style beef and sea salt beef were in my pack. Wanted to see which ones I liked before I spend money on them. I won’t be buying a whole box of a flavor I have never tried. Other than that this product is great, especially for protein on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. A family recommended these as a snack for my kids as we need something fast and protein filled to keep them focused for learning at home. Both of my kids (one who is very picky) really love these. Will Continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much!
customer_reviews.text: While doing a Whole 30 I discovered these and fell in love-so did my teenager and husband. Now I need to make sure I always have some in my house, my hiking backpack, and my purse for hunger emergencies. They are yummy and satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: beckieb714

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a great product that I can give my diabetic husband to snack on and know it will not spike his blood sugar and is good for him, and most important, he will actually eat and not give to the dogs! Thank you. We will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Talbott

customer_reviews.title: To each is own
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad. The turkey sticks in my opinion were horrific. The original lacked flavor. The others were pretty good. Not sure if I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: jgb_215

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order received
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try different flavors of Chomps and bought the variety pack to do so. Unfortunately, what I ordered was not delivered. Instead of the variety pack, I received original beef & jalapeño beef only. Disappointed in that. Both flavors are great & honestly, best “clean” beef jerky on the market! Hope to try some other flavors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reaid

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: These beef sticks are the best! My chiropractor recommended them and I will never eat another type. These Have zero sugar and are from grass fed beef. The flavor is amazing. The jalapeño are my favorite. They’re not too hot. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I’m on the paleo diet and I’m always on the go for my job and in my car and it’s my go to snack. The price is a little steep. I would buy them more if they were cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy ⚡️

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this full stars but I only received 2 flavors. I had ordered this before and really like that it is nitrate and hormone free. A lot healthier than jerky on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with these
customer_reviews.text: These things taste great and they have a fantastic macro profile. The ingredient list is nice and short as well. Also, the convenience of having easy travel, zero prep snacks really can't be overstated. I'll be ordering some more.
customer_reviews.author: zvee

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try, very tasty and low calorie.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product, with only 90 calories and very low carbs with good protein, this gives you the guilty pleasure of a stick of meat while not breaking your dieting budget. As far as flavor, they do not have the crunch or sharp flavor of a slim Jim (for example), but they are also not greasy like one either. They have a nice subtle and fresh taste. Definitely worth trying for anyone that wants a healthier meat snack.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Guilt free snacking!
customer_reviews.text: Love beef sticks and jerky but never eat them because of all the chemicals and concerns about the wholesomeness of the meat used in the manufacturing process. Chomps are amazing! Taste great using wholesome ingredients. Highly recommend. I have started buying the value pack for the slight cost savings. Wish it was a bigger discount but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Beware of mold
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s healthy and grass-fed, but sort of dry and one of the sticks was moldy when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Happilyeverafter

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy when I needed a pick me up while doing whole30. The flavor was good, for most of them. I prefer the beef to the turkey. The turkey had a weird taste that didn't sit well with me. I will be purchasing the beef! Even after whole30 I think I will keep these in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Devin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are as described. Very good. Dont like the cranberry its like a fresh bitter cranberry not a sweetened cranberry. These are real meat, very very good.
customer_reviews.author: ccovey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and taste
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I usually get the original beef flavor but I venturous and got the variety pack this month. All of them are just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Other brands are better
customer_reviews.text: The flavor and texture seemed a bit off. I only gave it two stars because the experience wasn’t too enjoyable. Maybe the product is healthy, but the flavor and texture is off. I would recommend paleo valley brand as a tastier alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: These are a delicious, low-fat snack. The flavor is just right for me, but if you like a spicy flavor they have an Italian snack stick = I'm trying that one next. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Teeples

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, easy and keto friendly!👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My husband and I eat keto and I send one in his lunch everyday as a snack. Delicious and easy. Love the variety of flavors and low carb! No guilt and delicious👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the variety pack. I got half jalapeño and half original. Not much variety there! I found them to be a bit mushy. Not so sure I’ll reorder.
customer_reviews.author: CeeJayBee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Its very tender without being greasy. The taste is great. Its perfect for outdoor activoties as well as a snack when watching what you eat...
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to try out all the flavors
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that there is a sample pack that isn't absurdly marked up from the regular price. Good way to figure out what flavor is worth buying. Few meat stick brands offer these kinds of sample packs unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: Chomps is a quick protein for a snack when I'm Starving
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy access to something that tastes great and is something that I can take with me for some quick energy and fill my tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk088

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: These sticks make the perfect snack. All of the flavor without all of the ick. Very filling, however I find them a bit pricey,
customer_reviews.author: hottahoo

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS...FRESH
customer_reviews.text: I buy the jalapeño and keep them in my fridge at all times ...never would I want to run out of these tasty nutritious healthy little snacks😃
customer_reviews.author: Mary Traver

customer_reviews.title: Chomps Beef Sticks
customer_reviews.text: They taste great and don’t make me feel like crap after eating one. It’s a nice snack that won’t wreck your diet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting without the fillers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actively tackling the Whole30 this month and what a treat it was to find Chomps. I bought the variety pack and love all the different flavors it has to offer. So far my favorite is Cranberry Habanero Beef Stick. I'll be buying a box of those for sure! Thanks Chomps for giving me something healthy to snack on without losing any flavor! I'm a huge fan!!
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Hanavan

customer_reviews.title: Boy was I disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Keto friendly with clean ingredients. But I didn't like the flavor. You may like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, tasty product!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that there were Jalapeno flavored ones, but my hubby said they were great!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase Chomps.
customer_reviews.text: These sticks were perfect for my whole30 active outdoor life style. So easy to throw in a backpack and very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Good snack with protein.
customer_reviews.text: Good snack with protein. A healthier option than the other nasty brands.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: Tasted good and beefy but left an aftertaste of tallow fat that was unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: M. Horan

customer_reviews.title: Like the beed flavor sticks, not so much on the other
customer_reviews.text: After trying these and finding the jalapeno beef sticks locally, they are a staple. Not too crazy about the turkey sticks. Not as pleasant an after taste.
customer_reviews.author: The Weaveman

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes Turkey Chomps so I got him this variety pack to see if he’d like to start getting other flavors. It’s got great variety and he’s pleased to be able to try each without a commitment to an entire box. Good ingredients and pretty allergen friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Grass fed, Paleo and great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cotten

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the variety pack. What I got. Was a 12 pack of all jalapeño beef . Ugggg. I hate jalapeño
customer_reviews.author: interesting

customer_reviews.title: Best snack for your coworkers to steal.
customer_reviews.text: Would be writing a more thourough review hadn’t my coworker ate most of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gaytha

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste but Costco has grass fed beef sticks which costs like approx. half the price. Worth getting a Costco membership if you eat these regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Mushy, weird taste
customer_reviews.text: Mushy texture, taste pretty bad. I prefer a drier smoked flavor these taste like under cooked gamey meat mush
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: I first came across these in WI at Trader Joe's....I would drive 30min to load up on this great protein snack. I'm on the go a lot for work travel so quick-flavor packed snacks are hard to find. These hit the mark-I just ordered off amazon for the first time and now I'm arm wrestling my husband for them. ORDER A LOT is all I'm saying....
customer_reviews.author: Dani C Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother since he has silacs and can't have gluten. He liked the flavors except the habenero.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M Vieira

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG REFUSED TO EAT THESE
customer_reviews.text: NASTY .....VERY NASTY...... HAS A GREASY FILM OVER IT THAT WILL MAKE YOU PUKE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon9669

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is a tasty assortment of meat sticks. They're tender and tasty with quality ingredients .
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for a couple on the keto diet. I personally do not like Jerky but they liked these
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Chomps Beef and Turkey jalapeno snacks
customer_reviews.text: I did enjoy the beef the turkey was a little dry for my taste otherwise it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Doug D

customer_reviews.title: Try these!
customer_reviews.text: These are all so good. They make a great protein meal/snack while on the run too! I haven’t had a flavor that I did not enjoy. Chomps are not greasy, but not dry either.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These chomps taste great, plus they’re made from grass fed beef, and quality ingredients. They are a great protein snack to pick me up in the middle of the day or enjoy instead of less nutritional snacks! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!! Love These!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!!! I buy them all the time, it's my favorite snack!! No gluten or soy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: See which ones you like!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! I bought this to see which flavors I would like. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack on the go
customer_reviews.text: Meat sticks are individually packaged, flavorful, and do not require refrigeration. Order was promptly delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: You can tell they don’t have the sugar and preservatives that other meat sticks do, but I don’t miss it! They have several great flavors and I enjoy them a lot! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Great snack food ... good replacement for chips for those afternoon hungers.
customer_reviews.author: Granny M

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Yum! If you are in line at Trader Joe’s and find yourself always grabbing those tasty beef sticks at the register, save yourself some time and grab a box of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly delicious and good variety
customer_reviews.text: These sticks are absolutely delicious. There is a good variety to choose from and I'm sure there is something for everyone. The Italian is my personal favorite but these have become a staple in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious in addition to being gluten free and dairy free! Love them! This is my new go-to snack.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not trusted resource
customer_reviews.text: I normally prefer not to write a bad review, but I have to say I am Very disappointed with this purchase. This is a food product and The security seal was opened when I received it. Plus, this product is not returnable. I will have to put it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and love the quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to cut out artificial ingredients and colors for my family. These CHOMPS sticks are delicious! The cranberry habanero beef was my favorite. I love how they are sugar free and humanely sourced and don’t contain any gross ingredients. Definitely recommended and I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: KD_runnr77

customer_reviews.title: Good protein snack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & taste. A little salty but it's jerky. Great snack
customer_reviews.author: NAK

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: This is the best jerky. I have ever had. I will keep this on auto purchase. Bought it first at Trader Joe’s and was hooked after!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leahvill

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed trying the flavors in the trial pack. I do like some more than others, but they are all high quality and delicious
customer_reviews.author: Dave l.

customer_reviews.title: Great meat sticks
customer_reviews.text: It all tastes great. The only problem is opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley R Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Yummy jerky, I loved the jalapeño and the original most.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious snack
customer_reviews.text: Nice snack to keep around! Easy for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The chomps variety pack is a great way to sample flavors. All are very tasty with clean ingedients. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Colantonio

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they are a bit more expensive, but the quality is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best meat sticks with quality ingredients and great flavor. I know they are a bit pricier, but they are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ransome

customer_reviews.title: Product received is different than picture
customer_reviews.text: The sticks are actually tasty given they have no sugar, unlike most regular beef jerky. HOWEVER, I can’t leave a positive review because this is being mis-sold as a variety pack of a bunch of different flavors, but in reality you only receive 2 flavors. Will not order again until that is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Mcleav

customer_reviews.title: Really good keto sticks
customer_reviews.text: Really like this combination of chomp sticks. Not a fan of turkey.
customer_reviews.author: tkirby

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was excellent. Would have preferred a little more snap when I bit into it, but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Dry and tasteless.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order of these. 1st time they were great but this past time something was off. They were dry and tasteless, like barely edible. They weren’t expired based on the date listed but the inconsistency was really disappointing. I won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. Not super salty nor fatty. The one with jalapeño, you could actually taste the pepper, not just the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chomps beef sticks are very good!
customer_reviews.text: My order came quickly. The beef stick flavors are very good and tasty. My. family enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for uncured
customer_reviews.text: I thought they tasted pretty good and the texture was OK. Honestly I like Dukes brand better. Chomps are a little softer and greasier than I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Bender

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These snack sticks are a perfect little munchie when you're on the go, or feeling a little peckish. They taste great, and are easy to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Chauntelle O'Loughlin`

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The beef are definitely more flavorful than the turkey. Both are good, but not great. I know I am paying for the quality ingredients, but would be nice to get a bit more flavor too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rykert

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and clean.
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. The best being Italian beef and Turkey Jalapeno.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Your worth it !
customer_reviews.text: YouTuber Tom Delauer recommendation to break a period of fasting with Chomps was “spot on.” Not inexpensive but worth it ! Gotta treat yourself, your worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying CHOMPS and I wasn’t disappointed. Good portion size, great flavor, a nice variety of options (e.g. venison, beef, turkey). I’ll definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Best meat sticks I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I have a very restrictive autoimmune diet and there are not many treats I can have. These meat sticks are delicious and satisfying. They are a little pricey but for the quality and the fact that it has nothing in it I cannot eat they are definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: suzee

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: They are waaaay to greasy. First bite the roof of your mouth is coated in a lard like feeling. Bt contrast the fruit bits pop and ooze. Yucky texture all around.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great snacks with minimal ingedients
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed the variety of tasty snacks while following the Whole30 plan; the sticks are actually very satisfying too when hunger strikes. A nice on-the-go option
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Degenhard

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got regular and Jalapeño, they are both very tasty, not greasy, does not cause heartburn & worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Leslieann

customer_reviews.title: Delicious 😋
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! We’re going to get these again we lived them.
customer_reviews.author: chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Meat Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: The CHOMPS meat sticks are the Cadillac of meat snacks, and this variety pack lets you savor a range of flavors. Each taste was unique and delicious. Worth the money as a delectable treat.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a filling snack with small servings of fruit and veggies. Also, great emergency purse snack. My husband wasn't a fan of the cranberry one, and we haven't tried the venison or the sea salt beef. But the rest of them were tasty!
customer_reviews.author: ireadgood

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a trial pack of flavors
customer_reviews.text: This was not a trial variety pack of 8. I only received regular beef and jalapeño beef. Unfortunately, you can’t return this item even though it’s not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and anabolic
customer_reviews.text: Love this jerky..it’s delicious and filling, but if it was a tad bit cheaper it would make it 100x better!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great, healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: We loved every flavor in the sample pack. It’s a great snack and perfect for me being gluten free. I’ve already ordered 5 more of the 10 packs in different flavors. My 8 year old son loves them too, even the jalapeño flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the outdoorsman!
customer_reviews.text: We are very strict keto. It is difficult to find keto products that are really clean and taste good. I bought these for my hubby who is an outdoorsman! These taste great and will be perfect for his days spent in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: CHOMPS Grass Fed Beef Jerky Sticks, Beef Variety Pack, 10 Sticks: (5) Original Beef, (5) Jalapeno Beef
feature_bullets: CLEAN SNACK - Each 1.15oz meat stick has 9g of protein, low sodium, low fat, low carb, sugar free & only 90 calories
DIET APPROVED - Our jerky sticks are Keto Friendly, Whole30 Approved, Paleo, Non-GMO, Certified Gluten Free
ALLERGEN FRIENDLY – All natural, real ingredients that are dairy free, soy free, nut free, gluten free, sugar free
ON-THE-GO, QUALITY PROTEIN - Our beef is 100% Grass Fed & Finished, Certified Humane, and nitrate nitrite free
DELICIOUS TASTE - (5) Original Beef and (5) Jalapeno Beef for both mild and spicy flavor choices!
